d.f: ￹￺to pull * draw something literally￻拉，牽，喻拉東西

e: ￹`Ma~`solot~ `nira~ `ko~ `faloco'~ `ako~.￺He has influenced me.￻他感化我的心，我的心被他影響
￹`O~ `koesan~`ay~ `a~ `sowal~ `nira~ `ko~ `sapi~`solot~ `nira~ `toya~ `fafahiyan~.￺He used polished speech to attract that woman.￻他用甜言蜜語引誘那女孩
d.f: ￹￺to attract * exert influence on￻吸引，引誘，使影響感化
